description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国蒙古族政治人物，曾任河北省人民政府副省长、河北省公安厅厅长。
description.en: A Chinese politician of Mongol ethnicity, who served as Vice Governor of Hebei Province and Director of the Hebei Provincial Public Security Department.

description.zh-cn: 河北省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Hebei Province.

description.zh-cn: 河北省人民政府下设主管全省公安工作的职能部门。
description.en: A functional department of the Hebei Provincial People's Government responsible for public security work throughout the province.

nodes.id: 公安部经济犯罪侦查局

zh-cn: 公安部经济犯罪侦查局
en: Economic Crime Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部内设机构，负责指导、协调全国公安机关经济犯罪侦查工作。
description.en: An internal department of the Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China, responsible for guiding and coordinating economic crime investigation work by public security organs nationwide.

nodes.id: 公安部巡视工作领导小组办公室

zh-cn: 公安部巡视工作领导小组办公室
en: Office of the Leading Group for Inspection Work of the Ministry of Public Security

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公安部内设机构。
description.en: An internal department of the Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中央纪委国家监委驻公安部纪检监察组

zh-cn: 中央纪委国家监委驻公安部纪检监察组
中央纪委驻公安部纪检组
en: Discipline Inspection and Supervision Group of the CCDI-NSC at the Ministry of Public Security

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会和中华人民共和国国家监察委员会派驻中华人民共和国公安部的纪检监察机构。
description.en: The discipline inspection and supervision agency dispatched to the Ministry of Public Security by the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China and the National Supervisory Commission of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 2022年6月10日凌晨发生于河北省唐山市路北区机场路一家烧烤店的寻衅滋事、暴力伤人事件。
description.en: An incident of provocation and violent assault that occurred in the early morning of June 10, 2022, at a barbecue restaurant on Jichang Road, Lubei District, Tangshan City, Hebei Province.

nodes.id: 夏季治安打击整治百日行动

zh-cn: 夏季治安打击整治百日行动

description.zh-cn: 因2022年唐山烧烤店打人事件，河北省公安厅于2022年6月25日部署展开的专项行动。
description.en: A special campaign deployed by the Hebei Provincial Public Security Department on June 25, 2022, in response to the 2022 Tangshan barbecue restaurant assault.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，刘文玺的前任河北省公安厅厅长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Liu Wenxi's predecessor as the Director of the Hebei Provincial Public Security Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，刘文玺的继任河北省公安厅厅长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Liu Wenxi's successor as the Director of the Hebei Provincial Public Security Department.

position.en: Party Leadership Group Member, Vice Governor

description.zh-cn: 2022年5月27日至2022年7月3日，刘文玺担任河北省人民政府党组成员、副省长。
description.en: From May 27, 2022, to July 3, 2022, Liu Wenxi served as a member of the Party Leadership Group and Vice Governor of the Hebei Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 2022年5月至2022年7月，刘文玺担任河北省公安厅党委书记、厅长、督察长。
description.en: From May 2022 to July 2022, Liu Wenxi served as Party Secretary, Director, and Inspector General of the Hebei Provincial Public Security Department.

relationships.target: 公安部经济犯罪侦查局

description.zh-cn: 刘文玺曾担任公安部经济犯罪侦查局副局长。
description.en: Liu Wenxi once served as Deputy Director of the Economic Crime Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security.

relationships.target: 公安部巡视工作领导小组办公室

description.zh-cn: 刘文玺曾担任公安部巡视办主任。
description.en: Liu Wenxi once served as Director of the Inspection Office of the Ministry of Public Security.

relationships.target: 中央纪委国家监委驻公安部纪检监察组

position.en: Party General Branch Secretary, Deputy Head

description.zh-cn: 刘文玺曾担任中央纪委国家监委驻公安部纪检监察组党总支书记、副组长，以及中央纪委驻公安部纪检组副组长。
description.en: Liu Wenxi once served as Party General Branch Secretary and Deputy Head of the Discipline Inspection and Supervision Group of the CCDI-NSC at the Ministry of Public Security, as well as Deputy Head of the Discipline Inspection Group of the CCDI at the Ministry of Public Security.

relationships.target: 夏季治安打击整治百日行动

description.zh-cn: 唐山烧烤店打人事件发生后，河北省公安厅于6月25日宣布展开“夏季治安打击整治百日行动”。
description.en: After the Tangshan barbecue restaurant assault occurred, the Hebei Provincial Public Security Department announced the launch of the 'Summer Public Security Crackdown 100-Day Campaign' on June 25.

relationships.target: 夏季治安打击整治百日行动

description.zh-cn: 河北省公安厅于2022年6月25日召开全省公安机关视讯会议，宣布展开“夏季治安打击整治百日行动”。
description.en: On June 25, 2022, the Hebei Provincial Public Security Department held a province-wide video conference for public security organs and announced the launch of the 'Summer Public Security Crackdown 100-Day Campaign'.

relationships.target: 夏季治安打击整治百日行动

description.zh-cn: 刘文玺出席了河北省公安厅部署“夏季治安打击整治百日行动”的会议，并部署相关事宜。
description.en: Liu Wenxi attended the meeting where the Hebei Provincial Public Security Department deployed the 'Summer Public Security Crackdown 100-Day Campaign' and arranged related matters.

description.zh-cn: 2022年唐山烧烤店打人事件发生于刘文玺上任河北省公安厅厅长后不久，给他带来了巨大的工作压力。
description.en: The 2022 Tangshan barbecue restaurant assault occurred shortly after Liu Wenxi took office as the Director of the Hebei Provincial Public Security Department, bringing him immense work pressure.

description.zh-cn: 刘文玺接替刘凯担任河北省公安厅厅长职务。
description.en: Liu Wenxi succeeded Liu Kai as the Director of the Hebei Provincial Public Security Department.

description.zh-cn: 董晓宇在刘文玺去世后接任河北省公安厅厅长职务。
description.en: Dong Xiaoyu succeeded Liu Wenxi as the Director of the Hebei Provincial Public Security Department after Liu's death.
